name: Auteur - Season 1
description:
As the star in an over-produced, under-funded TV show, it's your job to follow your director's whims, no matter how bad his ideas. What's popular right now? Zombies, of course! Jump on the band wagon and hope we get renewed for a second season!

We currently have an alpha version of the first "episode," of which there will be 3. This was the demo available for play at Pixel Pop 2018. To learn more, please watch our developer interview with Level 2 Gamers STL!

To load the level, pick up the script, hold it, then open the door with the other hand using trigger.

There is a new gun in each "scene" of the "episode." Just look down and to your right.

Each "scene" gains one new "zombie" spawn point, so we recommend playing with headphones so you can hear where they come from!
